title: Marriage to a Billionaire Series by Jennifer Probst
description:
The Marriage Bargain BOOK 1


A marriage in name only...

To save her family home, impulsive bookstore owner, Alexa Maria McKenzie, casts a love spell. But she never planned on conjuring up her best friend's older brotherÃ¢â‚¬â€the powerful man who once shattered her heart.

Billionaire Nicholas Ryan doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t believe in marriage, but in order to inherit his fatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s corporation, he needs a wife and needs one fast. When he discovers his sisterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s childhood friend is in dire financial straits, he offers Alexa a bold proposition.

A marriage in name only with certain rules: avoid entanglement. Keep things all business. Do not fall in love. The arrangement is only for a year so the rules shouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be that hard to follow, right?

Except fate has a way of upsetting the best-laid plansÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

The Marriage Trap BOOK 2


WIFE WANTEDÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Italian billionaire seeks faux fiancÃƒÂ©e. Willing to agree to anything in return...

In order for his sister to marry, Italian billionaire Michael Conte has to find himself a bride Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and fast! When he learns that photographer Maggie Ryan is going to be in Milan, Michael hatches a plan to introduce her to his family as his Ã¢â‚¬Å“fiancÃƒÂ©e.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Never mind that Maggie is confident, independent, and a control freak. Never mind that sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s everything he doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want in a wifeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ and everything he wants in his bed!

Convinced that Michael is in love with her married gal pal, Maggie agrees to keep up the ruse if heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll keep away from her friend. Besides, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not attracted to charming, ridiculously hot billionaires who drive her nuts. Once theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re in Italy, however, everything changes Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and the sexual tension between Maggie and Michael goes from simmer to naked nuclear meltdown!

But have they found the perfect arrangementÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ or are they trapped in a make-believe marriage?


The Marriage Mistake BOOK 3

Carina Conte has had a crush on her brother MichaelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best friend, Max Gray, since she was a teenager. Now sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s earned her MBA and come to work at MichaelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new venture, AmericaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fastest-growing bakery empire. But some things never change: her family still treats her like a child. With three drop-dead gorgeous siblings, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s still the ugly duckling of the bunch. And Max, the companyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new CEO, still barely notices her.

Max knows Carina Conte is strictly off limits. But hot-blooded lust wins out at a conference when the two share a scorching one-night standÃ¢â‚¬â€and are busted by her mother! Now, forced by old-world Italian tradition into a marriage heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not ready for, Max is miserableÃ¢â‚¬â€and Carina is furious. Her new husband is about to realize that hell hath no fury like a woman transformedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.


The Marriage Merger BOOK 4


Her sisters have found wedded bliss with their wealthy,wonderful dream men, but not Julietta Conte. SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s stayed on terra firma as top executive of the familyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s corporation, La Dolce Famiglia bakery. Work is her passion, and her trendy Milan apartment her sanctuary . . . until Sawyer Wells, a masculine masterpiece in a suit, lures her out of hiding with an irresistible offer: an exclusive partnership with his international chain of boutique hotels.

JuliettaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been burned beforeÃ¢â‚¬â€and trusting her brother-in-lawÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s friend, whose powerful gaze alone has her rethinking the best use of a conference room, is the riskiest proposition. But with a once-in-a-career chance to take the bakery global, will she mix stone-cold business with red-hot seduction?


The Book of Spells BOOK 4.5


The Official love spell from the Marriage to a Billionaire series And an exclusive short story with Nick and Alexa from the bestseller The Marriage Bargain.
